title: How to Make Eggs a la Paysanne

steps.headline: No oven temperature is listed but most shirred egg recipes use 350 °F (177 °C).
Mash the onion and garlic together.
Break eggs and add to the cream mixture.
Place the baking dish in a larger baking pan filled with water.
Bake until the eggs are set.

text: No oven temperature is listed but most shirred egg recipes use 350 °F (177 °C). Preheat oven to 350 °F (177 °C). Mash the onion and garlic together.  Add to the cream.  Pour into a baking dish.  Break eggs and add to the cream mixture.  Season with salt and pepper.  Place the baking dish in a larger baking pan filled with water.  Bake until the eggs are set.  Finished.
